title: Shawl, 1920–29
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (wound on silk core)
Technique: Jacquard woven
description: Square of black ribbed silk shot through solidly with gold thread secured in twill and satin weave. Printed in red and green in a pattern of huge rose wreath around a central sunburst of gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 1920–29.
1920–29. Medium: silk, metallic thread (wound on silk core)
Technique: Jacquard woven. Gift of Rodman A. Heeren. 1960-151-15.
